key.description: EL 项目唯一标识,在 DuMixAR 内容开放平台上传生成 项目后获取 KEY
key.description_zh: AR 项目唯一标识，在 DuMixAR 内容开放平台上传生成 AR 项目后获取 AR Key

type.description: AR camera type, get AR Type: 2D Tracking Type: 0SLAM Type: 5IMU Type: 8 after uploading and generating AR projects on the DuMixAR Content Open Platform
type.description_zh: AR 相机类型，在 DuMixAR 内容开放平台上传生成 AR 项目后获取 AR Type：2D 跟踪类型：0SLAM 类型：5IMU 类型：8

flash.description: Flash, values of auto, on, off

onError.description: The user is not allowed to use the camera or is triggered when the code scan fails
onError.description_zh: 用户不允许使用摄像头或扫码失败时触发

onLoad.description: Triggered when the AR loads successfully

onMessage.description: Developers can customize the buttons when making AR projects, and users will receive events and data when they click on them, see Code Sample 2: User-Defined Events for the user-defined event format
onMessage.description_zh: 开发者制作 AR 项目时可自定义按键，用户点击时会收到事件和数据，用户自定义事件格式参见代码示例 2：用户自定义事件

onScanCode.description: Triggered after the scanning is completed
